channel.title: ReDod [317 Oldschool] Brining Back The Good Ol' Days
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Thread is still being updated.[/size]
[center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/34gub7c.png[/img][/center]
[center]I remember back in 2008-2009, There were no shity hybrid pvp leeches. SoulSplit,Project 69, Dds-specz were all servers that dunked my cookie into milk. The Oldschool Graphics, the great economies with limited amount of items. There was no "torva" "korasis" or chaotics. Whips, dds , Godswords , bandos and the occasional set of Dragon claws were the only weapons in your arsenal. Im looking to bring back those days. No Torva, No Korais, No shit. I am looking for a trustworthy development team to help bring back these memories to everyone. [/center]
[center][u]Skype[/u] Nickypie123[/center]
[center]I Am In Need Of[/center]
[center]Website Developer ( forums html etc.)
Advertisers
Beta Testers ( will receive rank and have a good reputation when server comes out.)
Donators ( Whats a server without a donator, they will keep us alive)[/center]
[center][u]Features At The Moment[/u][/center]
[center]Fully Clipped Firemaking
Fully Working 7 quests
Fully Working Rune Essense Mine
items on death
caskets
Runecrafting Base Altars Added
Slayer Base ( will be adding oldschool slayer where npcs give xp, instead of tasks)
Wood Cutting With Stumps
Mining With Disappearing Rocks
KDR COMMAND ADDED
New Yell Command Added ( Req 11 hp to use)
Flawless Switching
Flawless PVP/PVM
ALL SKILL GUIDE INTERFACES
[/center]
[center][u]Media[/u]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/RP3.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/RP2-1.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/44444444444_0001.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/RP1.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/sd22ky.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/11c59qu.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l537/Streams2lakes/caskets.gif[/img]
[/center]
Please Post Bellow Or Add Me On Skype If Interested In This.
[size=24pt]Thread is still being updated.[/size]

item.title: ReDod [317 Oldschool] Brining Back The Good Ol' Days
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

Did I? Im pretty sure thats not it. Even if it was, Saying “back to the good days” isn’t copy righted. that slogal was around way longer than google. Thanks for the heads up though, il change it if there are problems.

EDIT - added items kept on death interface and ingame. I used the “toogle aid” button because its useless

Read full topic
